title: Listener Stories: Vol. 3
description: BUCKLE UP. It’s time for your third episode of listener stories. You guys bring the heat and scare the pants of us in this one. We also want to give a special shout-out to all our Patreon supporters - we love you to pieces! Don’t answer the door, hide under your covers, and (most importantly) stay thirsty.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
